Question
========

Suppose we draw a sample of size n = 4 from an N(50, 36) distribution. The probability that the sample mean lies between 47.0 and 51.8 is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 0.3094
* 0.3844
* 0.4239
* 0.567

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.3094: Incorrect
* 0.3844: Incorrect
* 0.4239: Incorrect
* 0.567: Correct
